content.question: Which of the following statements about the monopsonistic labor market shown in the accompanying graph is true?

choices.label: The single firm will hire <math alttext="L sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>L</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and pay each laborer a wage of <math alttext="W sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.
In this monopsonistic labor market when the single employer maximizes economic profits, there will be no deadweight loss.

The profit-maximizing monopsonist will hire <math alttext="L sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>L</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> labor and pay each laborer <math alttext="W sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math>.

When the single firm is maximizing profits, the marginal revenue product <math alttext="open parenthesis, M R P, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>MRP</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> of labor will exceed the marginal factor cost <math alttext="open parenthesis, M F C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle><mrow><mtext>MFC</mtext></mrow></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> of labor.

The marginal factor cost <math alttext="open parenthesis, M F C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle><mrow><mtext>MFC</mtext></mrow></mstyle><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> of labor with the competitive equilibrium exceeds the marginal factor cost of labor in monopsony.

content.answer: The profit-maximizing monopsonist will hire <math alttext="L sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>L</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> labor and pay each laborer <math alttext="W sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math>.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
